search_list.title: Manage Saved Searches

search_config.title: {action} Search
search_config.description: Configure your search parameters. The search will run automatically at the interval you specify.

data_description.search_query: What you want to search for (e.g., 'vintage camera')
data_description.site: Which country's eBay site to search
data_description.category_id: eBay category number to filter results (find this in eBay URLs)
data_description.min_price: Only show items above this price
data_description.max_price: Only show items below this price
data_description.listing_type: Filter by auction, buy-it-now, or show both
data_description.update_interval: How often to check for new listings (5-1440 minutes)
